verbose_text: In addition, AG490 and S1491 were also identified to alleviate the H/R induced apoptosis by inhibiting caspase 3 activity and modulating the expression levels of cleaved caspase-3, tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily member 6 (Fas), Fas ligand, B-cell lymphoma 2 (Bcl-2) and Bcl-2-associated X protein.
evidence: induced apoptosis by inhibiting caspase 3 activity and modulating the expression levels of cleaved caspase-3, tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily member 6 (Fas), Fas ligand
